place:
(:action place_ingredients_in_blender
    :parameters (?p - player ?y - yogurt ?b - bananas ?s - sorbet ?bl - blender)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?y) (inventory ?p ?b) (inventory ?p ?s) (at ?p ?bl))
    :effect (and (in_blender ?bl ?y) (in_blender ?bl ?b) (in_blender ?bl ?s) 
                 (not (inventory ?p ?y)) (not (inventory ?p ?b)) (not (inventory ?p ?s)))
)

(:action pour_smoothie
    :parameters (?p - player ?bl - blender ?g - glass)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?bl) (blended ?bl) (at ?p ?g) (chilled ?g))
    :effect (and (in_glass ?g smoothie) (not (in_blender ?bl ?y)) (not (in_blender ?bl ?b)) 
                 (not (in_blender ?bl ?s)) (not (in_blender ?bl ?r)))
)

(:action garnish_glass
    :parameters (?p - player ?st - strawberry ?g - glass)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?st) (at ?p ?g) (in_glass ?g smoothie))
    :effect (and (garnished ?g ?st) (not (inventory ?p ?st)))
)
```

This set of PDDL actions captures the steps and the descriptions provided for making a Banana Strawberry Rum Smoothie. Each action includes the necessary parameters, preconditions, and effects to ensure the task is performed correctly.
blend:
(:action blend_mixture
    :parameters (?p - player ?bl - blender)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?bl) (in_blender ?bl ?y) (in_blender ?bl ?b) (in_blender ?bl ?s))
    :effect (and (blended ?bl) (texture ?bl smooth))
)

(:action add_rum_and_blend
    :parameters (?p - player ?r - rum ?bl - blender)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?r) (at ?p ?bl) (blended ?bl))
    :effect (and (in_blender ?bl ?r) (not (inventory ?p ?r)) (blended ?bl))
)
